description._content: Photograph of H. Kirk, one of a group of photos of the Deseronto branch of the Sons of Scotland. A notice in The Tribune of November 27, 1903, states that the group met on the second Thursday of each month in the Masonic Building (the Clement Block). There is a Harry Kirk listed in the 1901 census for Deseronto. He was an accountant, earning $900, who was born in Scotland on 12 April 1854. He came to Canada in 1872. He was living with his wife, Jane, born in Ontario on 20 Jan 1851 and his children: Mary R. (born 2 Feb 1881), Mable (born 1 Sep 1884), Harry (born 9 Jan 1886), Frederick (born 8 Nov 1889), James (born 22 Sep 1892) and Clarence (born 17 Feb 1897).
